attributes.action: We would like to see the set up of a Mainland team to deal with IRA murders.
attributes.additional_details: We have the PSNI spending millions on investigations against the British forces during their time in Northern Ireland but refuse to put money into investigations regarding the murders committed by the IRA. We have seen over the past few years of the PSNI saying that they couldn't afford to open p investigations but are opening a new investigation involving the SAS in lough-gall. They also refuse to investigate the murders were evidence is has been presented to the police for them to be ignored.
attributes.background: The IRA have committed some of the worst murders and bombings in the world and they are still to be investigated by the PSNI. we have such killings and bombings as La Mon East Belfast,Omagh bombing,Remembrance bombing Enniskillen,Kings mill massacre, the killings of service personnel.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
